name: Broad_Sword_Assassins_Strike
display_help: Wield a Broad Sword and master a variety of powerful Lethal attacks. Slower than a Ninja Blade the Broad Sword's weight strikes with more force and damage. The Broadsword can reduce an enemy's Defense, allowing other attacks to hit more reliably. The Broad Sword is a powerful melee weapon that has a bonus to Accuracy. Like all Stalker powers, all Broad Sword attacks can sometimes land a critical hit for double damage.
